Method Detail

rotate

public void rotate(String photoId,
                   int degrees)
            throws IOException,
                   FlickrException,
                   org.json.JSONException
Rotate the specified photo. The only allowed values for degrees are 90, 180 and 270.

Parameters:
photoId - The photo ID
degrees - The degrees to rotate (90, 170 or 270)
Throws:
org.json.JSONException
IOException
FlickrException
